text: 16.16: Zo 3.18; 3.36; 12.48; FG 2.38; Ro 10.9; 1 Pi 3.21Gumgi gu mbigi maaŋ muuŋgip, mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ mbararav, nta khothivɨv, ruarga, Fhe Bakɨme zazera mbara muuŋgia ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn mben nɨɨŋgirga. Gumgi gu mbigi maaŋ muuŋgip, mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ mbararav, nta khothivi fhu, mbe zumgum Fhe Bakɨme nɨma thivgirim, ana ne suaŋv mbe fuv Her ga suegɨrga.
